text:
e="preserve">Nomvuzo Francisca Shabalala (1960 – 26 December 2020) was a South African politician. She was a member of the African National Congress and the South African Communist Party. From 2011 to 2016 she was the deputy mayor of the eThekwini Metropolitan Municipality. In 2018, Shabalala was elected a member of the National Assembly.
Shabalala died on 26 December 2020 at the age of 60. The cause of death was problems caused by COVID-19.
